parameters.name: ExportArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the export.

nested_items.name: ExportDescription
nested_items.description: Represents the properties of the export.

nested_items.name: ExportArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table export.

nested_items.name: ExportStatus
nested_items.description: Export can be in one of the following states: IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, or FAILED.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the export task began.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the export task completed.

nested_items.name: ExportManifest
nested_items.description: The name of the manifest file for the export task.

nested_items.name: TableArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table that was exported.

nested_items.name: TableId
nested_items.description: Unique ID of the table that was exported.

nested_items.name: ExportTime
nested_items.description: Point in time from which table data was exported.

nested_items.name: ClientToken
nested_items.description: The client token that was provided for the export task. A client token makes calls to ExportTableToPointInTimeInput idempotent, meaning that multiple identical calls have the same effect as one single call.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket containing the export.

nested_items.name: S3BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the bucket containing the export.

nested_items.name: S3Prefix
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket prefix used as the file name and path of the exported snapshot.

nested_items.name: S3SseAlgorithm
nested_items.description: Type of encryption used on the bucket where export data is stored. Valid values for S3SseAlgorithm are:
AES256 - server-side encryption with Amazon S3 managed keys.
KMS - server-side encryption with KMS managed keys.

nested_items.name: S3SseKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS managed key used to encrypt the S3 bucket where export data is stored (if applicable).

nested_items.name: FailureCode
nested_items.description: Status code for the result of the failed export.

nested_items.name: FailureMessage
nested_items.description: Export failure reason description.

nested_items.name: ExportFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the exported data. Valid values for ExportFormat are DYNAMODB_JSON or ION.

nested_items.name: BilledSizeBytes
nested_items.description: The billable size of the table export.

nested_items.name: ItemCount
nested_items.description: The number of items exported.

nested_items.name: ExportType
nested_items.description: The type of export that was performed. Valid values are FULL_EXPORT or INCREMENTAL_EXPORT.

nested_items.name: IncrementalExportSpecification
nested_items.description: Optional object containing the parameters specific to an incremental export.

nested_items.name: ExportFromTime
nested_items.description: Time in the past which provides the inclusive start range for the export table's data, counted in seconds from the start of the Unix epoch. The incremental export will reflect the table's state including and after this point in time.

nested_items.name: ExportToTime
nested_items.description: Time in the past which provides the exclusive end range for the export table's data, counted in seconds from the start of the Unix epoch. The incremental export will reflect the table's state just prior to this point in time. If this is not provided, the latest time with data available will be used.

nested_items.name: ExportViewType
nested_items.description: The view type that was chosen for the export. Valid values are NEW_AND_OLD_IMAGES and NEW_IMAGES. The default value is NEW_AND_OLD_IMAGES.
